name: OS 6-inch Revised Edition â€” Lancashire CIV (1894)
description: Ordnance Survey six-inch revised edition covering central Manchester. Surveyed 1888-1893, published 1894.
notes:
NLS has georeferenced seamless layer (1888-1915) via MapTiler API (requires key, free tier 100k tiles/month).
MapTiler tilesets: uk-osgb1888 (multi-scale) or uk-osgb10k1888 (6-inch detail only)
Tile URL: https://api.maptiler.com/tiles/uk-osgb10k1888/{z}/{x}/{y}.jpg?key={apikey}
Get free key: https://cloud.maptiler.com/

4 sheets covering Manchester (earliest editions):
  CIV.NW (surveyed 1888-89, pub 1894): https://maps.nls.uk/view/101103782
    IIIF: https://map-view.nls.uk/iiif/2/10110%2F101103782/info.json
    Bounds: -2.308708,53.481193 to -2.235722,53.510326
  CIV.NE (surveyed 1888-91, pub 1891): https://maps.nls.uk/view/101103800
    IIIF: https://map-view.nls.uk/iiif/2/10110%2F101103800/info.json
    Bounds: -2.235985,53.480936 to -2.162953,53.510111
  CIV.SW (surveyed 1894, pub 1896): https://maps.nls.uk/view/101103812
    IIIF: https://map-view.nls.uk/iiif/2/10110%2F101103812/info.json
    Bounds: -2.308922,53.452274 to -2.235985,53.481407
  CIV.SE (surveyed 1888-90, pub 1894): https://maps.nls.uk/view/101103827
    IIIF: https://map-view.nls.uk/iiif/2/10110%2F101103827/info.json
    Bounds: -2.236249,53.452017 to -2.163266,53.481193

Later editions also available (1909, 1923, 1936, 1946).
NLS IIIF Image API pattern: https://map-view.nls.uk/iiif/2/{folder}%2F{mapId}/info.json
